image.altText: Jamie Cripps celebrates a goal for West Coast against Adelaide

props.synopsis: Dynamic pricing means AFL fans in Adelaide may pay double what they would pay for a general admission ticket at the MCG or Docklands Stadium, as the federal government considers feedback on plans to ban the practice.Â

title.children: Criticism of 'unfair' dynamic pricing prompts calls to standardise AFL tickets

image.altText: A collection of buildings at a steelworks.

props.synopsis: The Whyalla steelworks owner says it will sell part or all of its stake in a New South Wales coal mine and use some of the proceeds to "catch-up" on payments owed to suppliers.

title.children: Steelworks owner to sell stake in NSW coal mine to pay Whyalla suppliers

image.altText: Lisa Cunningham

image.altText: A court build with a columned verandah and a blue coloured building behind

title.children: Man who snatched baby on SA bus released from custody

image.altText: ABC Adelaide Collinswood building. Photo taken Feb 13 2025.

title.children: ABC to move Adelaide operations out of landmark Collinswood building

image.altText: A large standstone home. A large navy boat is in front of it.

image.altText: Back of Helga Lam next to court justice scales

title.children: Four men who allege they were abused by female teacher agree to $2.5m settlement

Hamas and the Palestinian Islamic Jihad group have revealed three men will be freed on Saturday, days after the fragile Gaza ceasefire was threatened
